title: Google Chrome's organize tabs will automatically reorder tabs
description: In a bid to upgrade user experience, the Chrome team is developing an "Organise Tabs" feature, soon to be seen at the top left corner of the browser, adjacent to the tab search function. This new addition would be a natural extension of Tab Groups functionality. [...]

title: Microsoft 365 admins warned of new Google anti-spam rules
description: Microsoft urged Microsoft 365 email senders this week to authenticate outbound messages following new anti-spam rules for bulk senders announced earlier this week by Google. [...]

title: Third Flagstar Bank data breach since 2021 affects 800,000 customers
description: Flagstar Bank is warning that over 800,000 US customers had their personal information stolen by cybercriminals due to a breach at a third-party service provider. [...]
